title: The spider-man trilogy
content: Spider-man is a superhero film series produced by Columbia Pictures and Marvel Entertainment. It began with Spider-man in 2002

title: The Dark Knight Trilogy
content: The Dark Knight Trilogy is a superhero film trilogy based on the DC Comics character Batman. The trilogy consists of Batman Begins (2005), The Dark Knight (2008) and The Dark Knight Rises (2012), directed by Christopher Nolan.

title: The Lord of the Rings Trilogy
content: The Lord of the Rings is a film series of three epic fantasy adventure films directed by Peter Jackson, based on the novel written by J. R. R. Tolkien. The films are subtitled The Fellowship of the Ring (2001), The Two Towers (2002) and The Return of the King (2003).
